data: Head-forester | Santa Hermandad | Holy Brotherhood | Dispenser of Bulls
one year’s end to the other

In my opinion, what made the Head-forester Von Knör so incredibly sharp-set upon chess was, that from one year’s end to the other, he had nothing to do but to be, once during that time, the guest, the _Santa Hermandad_ or Holy Brotherhood and the Dispenser of Bulls to the rangers.
